Uses of Class
modele.Character

Packages that use Character
Package
Description
modele
 
modele.occupant_no_moveable
 

  • Uses of Character in modele

    Subclasses of Character in modele
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Cheater
    A character that cheat the hunters by giving them the worst direction to the treasure witch is the opposite of the best direction minus 1 mod 8 to make sure that the hunter does not go back to the treasure after hitting a border
    class 
    Hunter
    Hunter class is a character that can move on the grid and try to find the treasure.
    class 
    WiseMan
    The WiseMan class is a character that guides the hunter to the treasure by giving him the best direction to the treasure.
    Methods in modele with parameters of type Character
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Border.process(Character m)
    Makes the given Character bounce when it hits the Border.
    void
    Cheater.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between the cheater and a character If the character is a hunter, it will give him the worst direction to the treasure Otherwise, it will give him a random direction
    void
    Hunter.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between the hunter and an occupant it set the direction of the character to a random direction
    abstract void
    Occupant.process(Character m)
    Interact with the given character mostly used to change its direction
    void
    Questionable.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between the Questionable and a character.
    void
    WiseMan.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between the WiseMan and a character.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Glue.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between the glue and a character
    void
    Ladder.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between a Chharacter and the Ladder If the Character is a Hunter and the Ladder is usable, the Hunter picks up the Ladder and the Ladder is no longer usable
    void
    Pickaxe.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between the pickaxe and a character.
    void
    RoadMap.process(Character m)
    Process the hunter It changes the hunter's direction to the best direction to the treasure
    void
    Stone.process(Character m)
    Process the interaction between a character and the stone It breaks the stone for a short period of time if the character has a pickaxe (only hunters can have a pickaxe) Otherwise, it will make the character go to the closest side of the wall using the tempDir attribute of the character
    void
    Treasure.process(Character m)
    This method is used to process the treasure.
